ProjectTitle: Nano-hybrid materials based on metal-organic frameworks as artificial enzymes for proteomics applications
InitialFeedbackHistory:
30/04/2024
Data: if you will use any samples/materials, please also list these in the table and describe how these are documented and stored, these are considered physical data in the context of a DMP
Storage: storing data on hard drives is not very secure, please have a look at the storage guide for solutions recommended by KU Leuven, most of these make automatic backups: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Preservation: please correct Research Data Respiratory (RDR) Research Data Repository. Note that RDR is a data repository for data publishing which preserves data as well, but you can't use RDR just for archiving without the intention to share, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
Sharing: peer reviewed publication are not in the scope of a DMP, please describe here how you will share your data underlying these publications.
label: good with suggestions
